description:
The bondage on Kink.com's sites may seem complicated, but with a few
kinky bondage fundamentals you can get tying and playing in minutes. To
show you how easy it can be, rope educator Lochai enlists
the aid of Bella Rossi, the busty babe who's been wriggling,
writhing and squirting her way across a half-dozen Kink.com's sites. Lochai utilizes Bella's fetching form to demonstrate two
simple, sexy and practical ties: the Texas Handcuff and the Double
Column Tie. Grab a length of rope, a willing victim or two, and then
watch and learn. And hey, if tying rope gets your juices flowing, more
power to you! Who said [REDACTED] can't be fun?
title: Lochai Demonstrates 2 Easy Ties You Can Learn in Minutes
